summary: The diff implements both REQ-1 and REQ-2 with minor discrepancies. REQ-1 is fully implemented: URL detection via regex in MessageBubble, clickable links rendered with ExternalLink icon. REQ-2 is mostly implemented: modal intercepts link clicks, shows correct disclaimer text, has Cancel button, and has a button to open the link in a new tab. However, the Confirm button is labeled 'Continue' instead of 'Confirm' as specified.

missing_requirements.requirement: The modal must have a Confirm button (opens the link in a new tab) and a Cancel button (closes the modal without navigating).
missing_requirements.reason: The modal's confirm button is labeled 'Continue' instead of 'Confirm' as explicitly required by the spec.

hallucinated_features.description: The disclaimer modal displays the target URL in a styled preview box below the description text.
hallucinated_features.reason: The spec only requires the disclaimer text, a Confirm button, and a Cancel button. Displaying the target URL in a separate styled element was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: The disclaimer modal title includes an ExternalLink icon alongside a 'Leaving Chattr' heading.
hallucinated_features.reason: The spec does not mention a modal title or icon in the modal header; only the disclaimer text and two buttons are specified.
